LanguageData.Bed_Ergonomic.label: ergonomic bed
LanguageData.Bed_Ergonomic.description: An ergonomically designed bed to help support the spine, distribute body weight and overall enchance sleep quality.
LanguageData.Bed_DoubleErgonomic.label: ergonomic double bed
LanguageData.Bed_DoubleErgonomic.description: An ergonomically designed double-wide bed to help support the spine, distribute body weight and overall enchance sleep quality. Fits two.
LanguageData.Table_Wardrobe.label: wardrobe
LanguageData.Table_Wardrobe.description: A tall wardrobe for storing clothing and other items. Gives a small sleep effectiveness bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one wardrobe near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Seat_ModernChair.label: ergonomic chair
LanguageData.Seat_ModernChair.description: A flexible ergonomic chair designed to fit the curves of the human body, improving comfort.
